mean_cn: n. 奖品，战利品，胜利纪念物
mean_en: an object (such as a large cup or sculpture) that is given as a prize for winning a competition
sentence: All I want is to win first place and have my name on a big trophy.
sentence_trans: 我只想赢得冠军，把我的名字印在大奖杯上。
word_etyma: trop转 + hy物 → 经过轮番努力而得到的东西 → trophy 奖品，胜利纪念品
